title: Boss01
body: Ah, Jimmy Mulligan, what an unexpected surprise. [[Answer:Player1.2|Player1.2]] [[Answer:Player1.3a|Player1.3a]]

title: Player1.2
body: You'll spend the rest of your life in prison, you murderous bastard. [[Answer:Boss1.4b|Boss1.4b]]

title: Player1.3a
body: I know you killed John Doe. [[Answer:Boss1.4b|Boss1.4b]]

title: Boss1.4b
body: Unfortunately, there's a pesky little thing called evidence. Have you got any? [[Answer:Player1.4End|Player1.4End]] [[Answer:Player1.5a|Player1.5a]]

title: Player1.5a
body: <reqVar>hasPicture 1</reqVar>Would a picture of you covered in blood convince you? [[Answer:Boss1.5b|Boss1.5b]]

title: Boss1.5b
body: My lawyers beat worse charges before breakfast. That's ketchup, of course. [[Answer:Player1.5End|Player1.5End]] [[Answer:Player1.7a|Player1.7a]]

title: Player1.7a
body: <reqVar>hasBusinessCard 1</reqVar>And of course, your blood was found at the scene. [[Answer:Node|Boss1.7End]]
